table_name: AI Copilot User Research - Theme Summary

verbatims: It writes like a robot, not like my brand
I set up my brand preferences but it ignores them
The tone is always wrong - too salesy
Why doesn't it remember my style?
rows.synthesis_notes: Users have clear brand voice expectations set in their profiles/settings, but Ghostwriter output doesn't reflect these preferences. This creates a perception that the AI doesn't 'know' them despite onboarding efforts.

verbatims: I say 'make it shorter' and it starts over
It doesn't remember what we were working on
Every message feels like starting from scratch
rows.synthesis_notes: Within a single content creation session, users expect Ghostwriter to maintain context of the conversation (previous suggestions, feedback given). Currently, each request appears to be processed independently.

verbatims: After months of using it, shouldn't it know what I like?
I wish it would learn from my edits
rows.synthesis_notes: Some users expect Ghostwriter to improve over time based on their editing patterns and accepted/rejected suggestions. This represents a more advanced personalization expectation that may require significant architecture work.
